snippet.title: Apollo Justice: Appeal To Truth! [FT] Part 1: Turnabout Dawn
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

Let's dive into another series of cases! (Only two done so far)

In this case, we have another take on Apollo Justice's debut, with new faces and a very interesting familiar face by his side! 
-------------------
Fangame by MasqueradeDemure!
Find the PyWright download at Cort Records here! https://forums.court-records.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=33339&hilit=appeal+the+truth

Watch more fangames from me! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaW1SKhhC603QTjdxirWYw0wcFjqnpW8v
